attributes.name: Enrollment
attributes.description: Details on how and when members can join a `Group`.

attributes.name: auto_closed
attributes.description: Whether or not enrollment has been closed automatically due to set limits

attributes.name: auto_closed_reason
attributes.description: Brief description as to which limit automatically closed enrollment

attributes.name: date_limit
attributes.description: Date when enrollment should automatically close

attributes.name: date_limit_reached
attributes.description: Whether or not the `date_limit` has been reached

attributes.name: member_limit
attributes.description: Total number of members allowed before enrollment should automatically close

attributes.name: member_limit_reached
attributes.description: Whether or not the `member_limit` has been reached

attributes.name: status
attributes.description:
Current enrollment status. Possible values:
* `open` - strategy is not `closed` and no limits have been reached
* `closed` - strategy is `closed` _or_ limits have been reached
* `full` - member limit has been reached
* `private` - group is unlisted

attributes.name: strategy
attributes.description: Sign up strategy. Possible values: `request_to_join`, `open_signup`, or `closed`

attributes.name: per_page
attributes.description: how many records to return per page (min=1, max=100, default=25)
